divs: Sighting DetailsRiding to loranger and i was watching 2 planes to see if they were leaving chemtrails and this shiny silvery metallica object just appeared behind the plane. It sat in place for about 20 secs n vanished before i could get my phone out to take a picture. Planes were not leaving chem trails tho. I was somewhat excited because i see these things like this a few times a year.
Summary: appeared behind plane stayed in place for 20 secs then vanished.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hammond
There was one other sighting in Hammond on or around January 2nd 2012
